snippet.title: COLD HEARTS (GDC Trailer) - Visual Novel About Romancing Refrigerators
snippet.description:
ADD TO YOUR WISHLIST: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1035840/Cold_Hearts
PLAY DEMO NOW: https://outstar.itch.io/cold-hearts-demo 
It's free to stream/record/share with others! :) 

Hey everyone,

I'm sorry for being silent for a while, but as you can see, I was quite busy! :) It seems like I'm not releasing one, but TWO things this year - first, this game, our passion project, a visual novel I've been working on for years now with my best friend Memoriesin8bit (Tower of Guns, Mothergunship). Second - I have a baby on the way :O So, yeah, this year is going to be very special for me!

This trailer is done in preparation for my very first GDC I'm going to attend in March, so if you plan to go there, try to find me in the crowd - I'll have exclusive Cold Hearts fridge magnets with me!

Hope you're all doing okay, fam, miss ya! Remember you can always catch me on Twitch, where I stream very often, and I'll eventually be back to YouTube - especially after the devil spawn is born, as recording will be way easier than streaming then (at least... I think so?) :) 

Cheers!

TRAILER CREDITS
Art & animation - Outstar

Music - ふうか まりを - A wandering minstrel 
Words: Fuuka Mariwo 
Music: Souichi Sakagami 
Vocal: Fuuka Mariwo
https://www.tandess.com

Credits for external assets used:
AllDesignCreative.Com
Green Screen Alpha
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCycpldDu5UIesTdj_IO0D3A
Duck Duck TV
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpF2HT3G_A1LMQfZfvdXWeQ
